thread.section_title: macs4u.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of macs4u.com | www.macs4u.com
thread.title: Joe

author: Joe
title: Joe
text: I had a good feeling about Macs4u looking over their offerings and website---and that feeling was confirmed every step of the way. Ordering was easy, the shipping costs reasonable, and the proof was in the machine that arrived 3 days later. Booted it up to find a helpful text doc on the desktop letting me know what to do next. AND - we got a nifty colored MacBook and keyboard cover added at no extra charge. I've bought many used macs before but this was the best experience yet. And the computer has been purring nicely on my desk ever since.
